name: pubg-bot
description: Show current PUBG session in Discord

scripts.build: rm -rf ./build && mkdir build && cp game.js ./build/game.js && cp spotify.js ./build/spotify.js && cp index.js ./build/index.js && cp winner.mp3 ./build/winner.mp3 && cp package.json ./build/package.json && cp config.json ./build/config.json

author: Emil Lindau
